name: Aladdin Cart Rush 3D - Fun Racing Game for Kids
name_original: Aladdin Cart Rush 3D - Fun Racing Game for Kids
description:
Aladdin has time travelled to 21st century with the help of his lamp of Wonders.He has to run away as soon as possible before he is trapped by others! And the only way he could figure out is a Cart .
Can you help him and his fellow contemporary?

Can you Imagine Aladdin Riding a Cart with his classic attire on a highway on his Mat in between Cars and busses and trucks.This game is an absolute fun to play with all the odd combinations.
> Fun Game with Easy and Smooth Gameplay
> Cute Characters to Unlock
> Different Worlds to Ride through.
> Upgrade Speed, Handling and Breaking
> Intelligent and fast enemies.
> Super Beautiful Graphics.
> Game center Leaderboard
> Facebook integration.


Please get it to try this fun and Leave a rating and give your feedback so we can further improve the game.
